Package view

package view
  • Class
    Description
    CalendarApp
    The main application class for the Calendar App.
    CalendarGUI
    Represents the main GUI window for the calendar application.
    CalendarSelectionPanel
    Panel for Calendar Selection, Edition, and Creation.
    CreateCalendarDialog
    Generates a simple Create Calendar Dialog.
    DayPanel
    Represents a single day cell in the calendar's month view.
    EditEventDialog
    A dialog that allows editing a single event.
    EditMultipleDialog
    A dialog that allows multiple editing of the events.
    EventCreationDialog
    A dialog for event creation.
    ICalendarView
    Represents the GUI view interface for the calendar application.
    ImportExportPanel
    A representation of the ImportExportPanel which has Import and Export Buttons.
    MonthViewPanel
    A panel displaying the calendar view of a single month.
